He stops by the local bar as there were multiple
witnesses to Joe's last night before he disappeared.
He spoke with
a woman who recognized Joe from the picture.
He was in here last night," she said, "He was drinking way too much, very drunk.

" said the woman.

"Did he say where he's going to go?"
Detective Tapp asked.
He was talking about his wife and kids," the woman said.
He said that his wife was always complaining about how much he worked, and it made him stressed.

"

Detective Tapp
leaves the bar and gets a call from his partner.
His partner said,
"We found Joe's car on the highway.
